Alright, what's the plot?

Is it one where the goddesses and demons get a set amount of power each day, but can increase it through their recharge medium. However, their recharge medium in this story is kissing mortals.

And the stronger they feel towards the mortal, the bigger the boost.

However, the feeling doesn't have to be love. an example is due to how much Mara hates Keiichi, she gains a similar-sized boost that Belldandy gets when they kiss Keiichi.

===

In chapter 69 ( the battle for Keiichi in the english release), Peorth finds Urd's seed of love from chapter 12 (Love potion number 9 in the english release) and alters it into a pill that should make whoever imbibes it love Peorth.

Because Peorth put in in some soda when it wasn't supposed to be put in, it made whoever Keiichi looked at fall in love with him.

In this version, whoever Keiichi looks at gets a strong desire to kiss him.

How strong?

Practically and addiction. One so strong, not even Belldandy is immune.

===

in chapter 84 (Sayoko or bust in the english releas), Keiichi and the goddesses are trying to find Sayoko in the transformed N.I.T. campus, so they can put a stop to the wish that Mara granted her.

Keiichi came across Shiho, who appeared to have captured Sora.

Shiho managed to summon a number of ghost and sent them after Keiichi. One of which appeared to be the head of a humanoid woman about to kiss someone.

Imagine if all those summoned spirits were just like that woman head and they all wanted to kiss Keiichi forever?

Heck, they could even possess Belldandy and the others to fulfill their desires.

"Finally..."

The Kissing Ghost felt a powerful mixture of emotion well up in her chest (or, at least, where her chest should have been).

"Finally, I did it! I finally trapped someone! Now I'll never be alone!"

She felt giddy, like a child again. She was always, at best, ignored in the spirit world; whether it was because of her lack of inhibitions, her ignorance of social cues, her incessant attempts to kiss people, or some combination of the three, there was no denying everyone would rather be anywhere but with her. She spent countless days with nothing to do but think to herself and wander around. Eventually, her living name was lost to time, and most spirits just named her after what she does best: kissing people! The first time she did anything with anyone who could stand her in eons was when she was found by Shiho. She was happy enough that she'd do pretty much anything for her new 'friend'. Though the ghost was elated to be of use to someone, something even more exciting caught her fancy: that cute boy she was brought to the living world to defeat!

She got the chance to put her skills to use, separating herself into copies before giving the boy (what did Shiho call him again? Oh, right! Keiichi!) what she hoped was the best smooching of his life. Her clones tied him up and laid smack over smack onto his bare skin, sapping his will to resist. This was her first time successfully cornering someone! In that moment, she knew she had to have more.

She and her clones continued to coat him head to toe with their loving kisses even after she noticed he was unconscious, and long after he actually passed out. She didn't even notice when Shiho and Sora took their leave; it was only when his stupid girlfriend Belldandy came by that she finally stopped and hid. As she hid away and monitored the situation, she saw how close she was to Keiichi. At first, she was madly jealous, but when she thought about it...

Maybe this cow isn't so useless after all... The Kissing Ghost smirked, plotting her next move.

Coiled and waiting for a chance to strike, she possessed Belldandy when her back was turned (but not before giving her prey a playful air kiss to tease him). Since the girl didn't see her possessor when she had her body stolen, she couldn't spoil the Kissing Ghost's subsequent makeout session with her soon-to-be lover.

"I still dont understand it myself" you replied thoughfully. "I just recently earned the promotion to Jonin. I honestly didnt expect to become a sensei for the next couple of years. I am still a teenager myself, you know."

"I was just lucky that I graduated before that particular age restriction was set in stone" you attempted to show some modesty. "The new genin don´t even get the chance to try what we pulled off."

"That may be true, but I can understand why the Five Kage decided that way. The numbers pretty much speak for themselves."

Several years ago, shortly after your own graduation, a new rule was installed to lower the casualties in the field. After too many genin died because they graduated too early and were not really ready yet for the harsh ninja life, the Hidden Villages held one of the rare Five Kage Summits and agreed on a proper age restriction. From here on out, every genin had to be at least 15 years old before he or she was allowed to graduate from the academy.

"That just makes it worse" you complained while running with one hand through your hair. "It means my students are nearly the same age as myself. There is no way they will respect me. Not to mention they are all troublesome teenage girls."

There was a moment of silence as you stared at the trio dumbfolded. Whatever you expected them to say, this was not on the list at all. “Ok, my first impression… you are a bunch of weird hormonal teens.”

In an attempt to dismiss their strange desire for kissing, you quickly got back to business and told them about the final test and how they are not truly genin yet.

"Understood? Your job is to take these bells from me by any means necessary. Whoever does not have a bell when the time runs out will fail and get sent back to the academy."

"Why does it have to be bells?” Ino asked once she got over her initial shock. “That is boring, I think we should fight for something more valuable so that we are all properly motivated.”

"Oh, and what exactly do you have in mind then?" you asked, faking curiousity.

"A kiss of course!" the blonde shouted out immediately. "Let us fight for your lips! Those of us who manage to kiss you within the time limit will stay on the team!"

Sakura and Hinata blushed lightly, but quickly gave their own agreements to this idea, making you think about it for a moment.

On one hand, you were making the rules and they had to follow them, no matter what. Disobeying direct orders from your squad leader was a no-go in the ninja world.

On the other hand, the exact rules for this test didn´t really matter as long as you got enough intel about their skill level. The test was simply for you to judge if they were prepared for the ninja life or not. If they were willing to go all out for a kiss, what´s the difference?

These girls were fresh out of the academy, they were not supposed to succeed anyway.

Naruto woke up and did his stretches. After that, he got dressed and ate breakfast. Once that was done, he walked out and headed to the Hokage tower, where he could check on what available missions there were.

“Yo, Granny! What missions do you got for me?” Naruto asked, strolling like he owned the place.

“I keep telling you to call me hokage, you cheeky brat!” Tsunade growled with a glare.

“And I keep telling you not to call me a brat. So what?” Naruto asked, returning the glare.

After a few moments, Tsunade sighed before she began to ruffle through the mission papers. Eventually, she stopped and calmly said, “I think I have something for you. Just come closer, Naruto.”

So Naruto did, expecting a mission or two.

He did not expect for Tsunade grabbing him by the throat and growling,“ Your task is to go train and don't cause trouble! I don’t have any missions for you today!”

After Tsunade let Naruto go, he took deep breaths for a while before he said, “Geez, Granny! You don’t have to be so harsh with me!”

“I have to because of that hard head of yours! It may have won you fights and friends, but it can make you really annoying to deal with! If you don't learn to dial it back, then I'll be forced to do it for you!” Tsunade spat back.

“Fine! I get it! I’ll leave you alone!” Naruto ranted before leaving.

Tsunade’s angry expression turned into an evil smirk. “And I hope you’ll enjoy my punishment for you, Naruto…”

Since Naruto didn’t have anything to do and most of his friends were busy, he went to one of the training areas. First thing he did was look around, making sure there were no traps or anyone who was knocked out, as well as look for forgotten equipment.

Once he knew the areas was clean, he did the handsigns for the shadow clone jutsu. Little did he know that Tsunade's secret seal on him made it so that he could now only create...

Author's note Crossover of Naruto and the Thumbelina movie)

After Jiraiya tossed him into the ravine, NAruto did his best to summon any toad who’d be willing to save him. Because he was so low on chakra, he was forced to call upon the Kyuubi’s power.

However, when the summon cloud vanished, In front of of him was a humanoid.

She had long pink hair, styled in a bit of a beehive with a pink feather sticking out of it. Her clothes were a green polka-dot dress, black opera gloves, black tights, and blue high heels.

However, it was her features that made Naruto realize that the person in front of him was female and a humanoid toad. She lacked a nose and had green skin. Her hands had three long fingers and an equally long thumb. The lips on her face were bigger than his arms. Her breasts were huge, probably the biggest he’d ever seen!

“What the? Where are we?” the toad asked as she looked around. Realizing that she was in front of a Summoner, she hugged Naruto tight to her body, saying, “Hold on, Chico! Mrs. Toad will save you and get us out of here!”

She leapt towards the wall, landing on one of the spikes before rapidly walljumping upwards until she landed on the grass above the chasm.

“There! Safe and sound! Just like I said,” Mrs. Toad exclaimed as she let Naruto stand on his own two feet, but she held his shoulders, so she could look him in the eyes.

Hiding behind a tree, Jiraiya uttered, “Huh? He’s supposed to summon Gamabunta! Instead, he summons… Wait, I don’t recognize her.”

Jiraiya leaned out and looked at Naruto. After a moment, the Toad sage’s eyes bugged out. “How did Naruto summon that? If she was a human or just less toad-like, I’d put her in one of my books!”

Naruto didn’t care for Mrs. Toad holding him, especially because her oddly sticky grip was preventing him from escaping. “Thanks for saving me… Erh…”

“Mrs. Toad. But you can call me Mama Toad…” Mrs. Toad answered before fluttering her eyes, “ Or better yet, call me lover.”

Before Naruto could react, Mrs. Toad kissed him. Though she was aiming for his lips, she covered the entire lower half of his face.

After calming down, a suddenly calm Jiraiya shrugged before walking away, nonchalantly muttering, “Eh, she’s his problem now.”

After a few steps, Jiraiya’s prankster side caused him to come up with a scheme to have some fun with Naruto and the new Toad summon.

All I want is you and you giving me the love that a man gives a woman!"

As fast as Naruto wanted to run, it currently was after that summoning training that Jiraiya forced him to go through. So Mrs. Toad easily caught up with the low-chakra Naturo.

Backing up against a tree and using one hand to lean against it, Naruto held out the other hand to ward off Mrs. Toad and said, “No! No! Stay back! I need to stay pure for Sakura!”

Stopping her puckering lips mere centimetres away from Naruto’s face, Mrs. Toad frowned and said, “But I only want what’s best for my husband!”

“Then go away and let me be with Sakura!” Naruto ordered.

After making a sad moan noise, Mrs. Toad smiled, scaring Naruto. She soon said, “Perhaps I need to talk with the Chica! Perhaps she’ll be supportive of us?”

“No! Stay away-” Naruto began before Mrs. Toad showered him with more kisses, briefly paralyzing him.

“I will return for you soon, husband!” Mrs. Toad answered before she leapt against a tree and began leaping from tree to tree towards Konoha.

After coming to his senses, Naruto ran towards Mrs. Toad, screaming for her to stop.

-o-

After Mrs. Toad reached Konoha and stood on top of the Hokage Rock, she was able to sense how Hashirama’s Wood release created the Village and more importantly, how she could use it to her advantage.

Her pleasant smile turned sinister as she said, “Why change the mind of one chica, when I can change all of them and their bodies?”

As the Toad woman made several hand gestures, Konoha women began to undergo a change. Their faces began to resemble a fusion of their own and Mrs. Toad. Their bodies began to alter to resemble her as well. Bigger bosoms, smaller waists, longer legs, bigger hips, bigger butts, and smooth green skin.

There were more changes, here and there, but ones that Mrs. Toad deemed necessary.

Due to the nature of Mrs. Toad's spell, no one currently in Konoha noticed the changes.

-o-

Eventually, Naruto was able to get into Konoha, but was completely out of breath.

Still, he continued on, looking for Mrs. Toad.

After a few minutes of searching the streets, Naruto thought he saw Mrs. Toad, dressed up like Mebuki Haruno. She currently was facing away from him.

As his mind raced with pranks as he snuck up his target. He barely noticed someone sneaking up on him.

When Naruto was a few feet away, he heard Sakura say, “Naruto… when have you looked so… handsome? So much better than Sasuke?”

Naruto smiled as he slowly turned around, saying, “Well, I always was like this, Sakura. I guess you just woke up to my... “

He stopped when he saw that Sakura looked like a younger Mrs. Toad dressing up as his female teammate. Naturo uttered, “Sakura?”

Putting one hand behind her head and the other on her hips, Sakura said, “The one and only! You look outright stunned by my beauty today!”

Mebuki made a ‘hn?’ noise as she turned around. When she saw Naruto and Sakura, Mebuki said, “ Oh! I didn’t know the two of you were there. How are you both?”

“Oh, just was trying to find a place to relax after some personal training,” Sakura answered.

“I’m… I’m searching for a summon that ran here. I was wondering if anyone saw her?” Naruto asked, still a bit out of breath. He began to wonder if he was under a genjutsu that made him see women as Toad women.

“Well, perhaps we all need a slight break. Let’s go to a park and relax, so you can tell us about your runaway summons, Naruto?” Mebuki asked.Both she and Sakura licked their lips as they looked upon the worried Uzumaki.

1153311.content:
A group of Jynx gathered at several lipstick factories, all of whom were furious at their treatment over the years.

They were seen as weird, bizarre, and off-putting. All because they liked to kiss and had a vaguely human appearance.

So a number of Jynx decided to punish humans by invading lipstick factories.

As they snuck into the factories, they used their psychic abilities to fool the guards and cameras. Once they got to the lipstick-making machines and storage, the Jynx used their powers to curse all of it., machines and lipstick.

As the Jynx left the factories, they all chuckled. Anyone that used the lipstick and kissed someone would have their lips increase to the size of a jynx, have a strong desire to kiss, and drain energy from whoever they kiss.

===

Right at one of Saffron city’s gates, Jessie and James were dressed as Hula girls They put a lei on Ash and kissed his cheeks.

At that moment, the disguised Team Rocket duo’s lips expanded to about the size of a Jynx. The desire to capture Pikachu was dwarfed by the desire to kiss.

They had planned on stepping away from Ash and tricking them, but the pleasure that the kiss brung caused the two to hug Ash, preventing him from running away from the kisses.

“Hey! Hey! Let me go! I got to go to the Pokemon gym here!” Ash cried out, trying to escape.

“Ledies, if you don’t free our friend right now, Misty and I will separate the two of you,” Brock said.

Misty nodded before saying, “Or we can have Pikachu do the honors of freeing Ash.”

“Pika-pi!” Pikachu added, letting out a little electricity.

Jessie and James glared at Brock, Misty, and Pikachu before freeing Ash.

“Brock, were their lips that big before?” Misty whispered.

“I’m not certain, but I’m pretty sure they weren’t,” Brock whispered back.

Ash hid behind Brock and Misty.

Jessie sighed, as she really enjoyed kissing Ash. She began, “Welcome to Saffron city, winners! You’re the one millionth millionth and first visitors!”

“Follow us to the grand prize room!” James added.

A cheerful Brock, Misty, and Pikachu followed after the disguised rocket members. A nervous Ash followed them. He thought, ‘Something about those kisses didn’t seem right. It was like they were draining my energy.’

Jessie and James entered a building and walked to the sides of the door, letting the trainers enter. Jessie said,”Right this way!”

Brock, Misty, and Pikachu entered without hesitancy, while Ash as to force himself to follow.

Only for Jessie and James to grab him.

“Wha-Let me go!” Ash cried out.

“We told you before, let Ash-” Brock began before he, Misty, and Pikachu fell in a hidden pit trap.

“Ah ha ha ha!” Jessie uttered before she and James hugged Ash once more, but this time delivering a flurry of kisses.

Ash soon was weakened enough that he needed to be held up.

“James, get the rope!” Jessie ordered.

“Right!” James said, still using the fake voice.

Jessie dragged the weakened Ash to a chair. James returned shortly with some rope. The two Rockets then tied Ash to a chair.

Meowth showed up and was surprised at seeing Ash, but no Pikachu. He asked,“Hey! where’s the Pikachu? ...And what’s upwith those lips, Jessie and James?”

“Wha… Team Rocket! I should have known,” Ash said in a angry-yet-weakened voice.

“The one and only,” Jessie cooed before giving Ash a kiss.

“Meowth, we discovered we enjoyed kissing Ash here more than the idea of getting his Pikachu for Giovanni!” James said in his normal voice before giving Ash a kiss as well.

Meowth sighed in exasperation before saying, Could you at least get on your uniforms and take that lipstick off?”

“Never,” James replied before giving Ash another kiss.

“Besides, Ash likes it when we kiss him with this lipstick on and while we’re dressed as hula girls,” Jessie added.

“No, I don’t!” Ash grunted, feeling weaker with each kiss.

As Jessie kissed Ash on the lips, James cooed, “You’re just playing hard to get. It does make you look all the more kissable.”

“And I thought you guys looked pathetic before,” Meowth muttered.

1153312.content:
Ash rushed for professor Oak's lab. He couldn't believe he would oversleep today of all days. It was the day he would get his first pokemon and start his journey as a pokemon master. He ran up the stairs to the lab as fast as he could, almost tripping along the way, until he finally reached the top. Hoping he wasn't too late, he knocked on Oak's door.

"Hmmm? Oh, Ash! I was wondering if you were going to show up today." Oak says as he looks over the boy. "You look like you're ready for bed, not pokemon." Ash notices that in his excitement, he left the house in his pjs.

"Never mind that. I'm here for my first pokemon professor Oak." Ash exclaims with gusto. Oak merely sighs and shakes his head.

"I'm afraid there's a bit of a problem with that." He says as he leads Ash into the lab. He brings the would-be trainer to a room with a circular table with three empty pokeballs on it. "All of our starter pokemon were taken by trainers that got here on time." He explains.

"You mean I can't get my pokemon?" Ash asks with defeat in his voice. Oak puts a hand up to his chin. Then, he felt a light bulb go off in his head.

"Oh wait, there is one pokemon we have left." He presses a button on the table, and from the center emerged a pokeball with a pair of lips on it. "This one is all we have."

Ash reached out and grabbed the ball. "Thanks professor Oak. Okay then, I choose you..." He opens the ball, and out popped a pokemon with a curvaceous body and plump, pink lips. The new trainer and pokemon stare at each other in silence for a few seconds before Oak speaks up.

"This is Jynx, an Ice/Psychic-type pokemon that..." He was interrupted by Jynx grabbing the sides of Ash's head and pulls him into a powerful smooch that covered his entire lower face. "can be very affectionate towards her trainer and others." He finishes.

Ash starts to grunt and scream, but they are muffled by the pokemon's lips. When she finally has enough, she pops off of the boy's face, leaving a massive lip mark in its place. "Jynx." It says, giving him a sultry stare.

"I guess I have no other choice. Okay professor, I'll take it." He pulls Jynx's pokeball back out. "Okay Jynx, return." He returns her to the ball, only for her to pop right back out and hug his arm.

"I don't think she wants to go back in, Ash." Oak explains. "And I don't think you have much say in the matter." Ash sighs in defeat as his gut tells him the professor is right.

"Fine. Alright then Jynx, let's go start our journey." He says with renewed gusto.

"Jynx" She replies. After a brief moment where Ash had to change out of his pajamas (during which Oak and 3 lab assistants had to restrain Jynx to keep her from entering on him), the two set out on their journey.

What happens next?

Ever since you were a small child, you've had a major problem. Girls were always going out of their way to try and kiss you. Now while that may sound like the dream, when you've had to spend every day in fear of some girl cornering you for a kiss, sometimes more, it was anything but. What's worse is that it wasn't exclusive to human girls either. Female pokemon would try for one too. You had a particular memory from a year ago where a flock of female spearow dive-bombed you to try and kiss you with their beaks.

Your mother tried to explain this with some mysterious event that happened while she was pregnant with you. She and your father were on a boat in the ocean to witness the Lovedisc mating season. Two of them in particular chose to leap into the boat and try to connect. However, instead of finding each other, they both planted their lips on either side of your mother's pregnant belly. She says that the event charmed the unborn child (you) with such love from the opposite sex.

Whether it was true or not is beyond you. What is true is that you'll never forget the first day it kicked in. You were only five years old in elementary school. You were approached by a girl your age named Sally and her Smoochum. It was then that she outright told you that they were gonna kiss you. You being the fearful child you were, ran away as fast as you could.

You ran and ran across the playground in circles for about ten minutes before they finally cornered you. That was only the start of it. Stores, playgrounds, even riding your bike couldn't happen without some pokemon trying to kiss you. This had you even more worried of today. Today was the day you were meant to go get your first pokemon and start your journey as a trainer. Problem was, you were terrified of wandering the world with this affliction.

But your dad was firm. He told you that this was the day you started to grow out of this fear. He pushed you outside, wished you good luck, then closed and locked the door. Great, now you were out here defenseless unless you went to get your pokemon. You turn around, preparing for your trip to the professor's place.

You closed the front door of Professor Juniper's lab. You were completely out of breath.

Professor Juniper looked at you with concern and asked, "Is everything alright, Kai?"

"Ye... yeah.... Just need a moment. Sally chased after me," you muttered as you took deep breaths.

"Oh, okay," Professor Juniper replied as she began to walked towards you. She stopped when she was a foot or two away from you.

Once you regained enough of your breath, you cheerfully said, "So I came here to get my first pokemon,"

Professor Juniper frowned a little, "Ah. You're a bit late. I just gave out my last pokemon for new trainers an hour ago. I won't be getting more until a month from now. The only ones with pokemon for new trainers is Sally's parent's and they're all Jynxes."

You froze.

"Ah. I see you don't want that. Then I have an offer," Professor Juniper said as she bent down to look you in the eyes. "How about becoming one of my Special Junior Lab assistant. Then you can have first pick when I get more pokemon."

You shivered for a moment before you asked, "Can I special request any pokemon?"

"That would mean working for me an extra month, but yes, you can," Professor Juniper answered.

"And what would I be doing as a Special junior Lab Assistant?" You asked.

"Oh, nothing much. Cleaning the place and some pokemon, feeding the pokemon, getting me and my other assistants food and drinks, nothing too hard, as you are still a kid," Professor Juniper answered.

You smiled and said," Alright, you got a new special Junior Lab assistant!"

"Then let's seal it with a kiss!" Professor Juniper said before grabbing the sides of your head and giving you a french kiss.

After a few moments, she let you go and said," I'll have to call your parents and let them know. So please wait in the waiting room."

So she walked away with an extra bit of sway in her hips.

You sat down in a chair and waited.

1153313111.content:
You didn´t had to wait for long before Professor Juniper came back with a big smile all over her face.

"Great news, your parents are fine with you working here for the next month, they hope that this will help you to grow more independent and responsible. Now for your first task..." she rubbed her chin, thinking about what would be best suited for you to start off.

"You looked quite shell-shocked before when I mentioned Sally´s parents and that you could receive a Jynx from them" recalled the Professor absently. "A lab assistant who is scared of pokemon has very limited use. We need to overcome this fear as quickly as possible, don´t you agree?"

You really didn´t like the direction this was going, but nodded your head regardless. It would look pretty bad to disappoint your new 'boss' so early on.

"Let me tell you a little bit more about Sally´s parents. It is true that they are skilled Jynx trainers, but they also provide me with massive amounts of data from their Personal Jynx Training Building. It is a vital part of my laboratory to collect and study this data in order to gain a better understanding of how all of the different training excercises affect each pokemon individually."

You nod again, quicker this time. You didn´t know Sally´s parents were actually such a big deal, but the explanation made sense so far.

"Just before you showed up they called and informed me that the newest batch of data is ready for me to pick up at the Training Building. If you ask me, that sounds like a nice and easy beginner task for my Special Junior lab assistant."

All colour drained from face as you slowly processed her words. Surely she could not be asking you to do THAT as the very first task, right? You still had nightmares from the time when you had gotten yourself trapped in that cursed building for three whole days.

"What are the other tasks I could choose from?" you asked with a shaky voice while trying to suppress the upcoming memories. There was no way in hell you were going anywhere near this terrifying smooch zone.

"What makes you think you have a choice?" Professor Juniper countered amused. "If you cannot even do such a simple task, then where do we go from here? If you are that scared of pokemon, how could you ever hope to become a successful trainer? Come on, grit your teeth and do it."

"Isn´t there anything else I could do instead?" you begged in desperation, knowing full well that Sally and her Jynx were still waiting outside for you to come back out. "Anything? Please!"

You knew exactly what this meant. You've had plenty of times where shop owners and the like would withhold services to make you kiss them. Option A, I take you back to the Jynx training facility and you get to learn from pros how to turn your disobedient Smoochum into a loyal Jynx." You grunt and wildly shake your head "no" at the suggestion.

"Option B, you take me and Jynx with you on the journey your father forced you on. We'll be there with you every step of the way, especially when Smoochum needs some 'visual aids'." You shake your head even harder at this new development. If you took these two with you plus your new Smoochum, you'd be one giant hickey before you reach Striaton.

Losing consciousness by kissing certainly wasn't on your to do list, and you still have nightmares of you vision being filled with pink lips after your last visit to that facility. Maybe you can rope in the three of them in time during your travels. It's a stretch, but you needed one right now.

"Grunt once for A, twice for B." You give her two grunts and watch as her face lights up. "Yay! Okay Jynx, let him go." Her Jynx finally frees your arms, allowing you to grab Smoochum off your face. Unfortunately, she's still struggling to try and kiss you more, lips smooching the air.

"Sally, advice?" You ask, holding back your tiny assailant as best you could.

"Lesson one of Smoochum training, if you want a Smoochum to listen to you, you have to show her you love her." As vague as that was, you had an idea of what she was saying, but you didn't like it. You give her a questioning look, hoping that you were wrong. "You have to kiss her back."

You hated it when you were right. You've already been kissed enough today and really didn't want this. But now that your arms were free, maybe you could return Smoochum to her pokeball for now and deal with this crap later.

What do you do?

Out of the ball came a small dark-gray Pokémon that strongly resembled a lizard. It had a short tail and purple eyes with slit pupils.

“This is Salandit, a Fire/Poison type pokémon that emits both toxic gas and flames" Professor Juniper explained. "The females are additionally able to release pheromones and can evolve into the very powerful and seductive Salazze.”

“And is this particular Salandit a female?” you asked curiously while bending down slightly to take a closer look at your new partner.

Before the Professor could respond, Salandit gave you a sultry stare right before exhaling a small purple cloud straight into your face, answering the question herself. Caught off guard, you stumble back and land flat on your butt in an instinctive attempt to move out of way. Gas clouds from poison types were usually nothing to laugh at.

“Looks like she already likes you” Professor Juniper giggled amused. "All right, now you are officially a pokémon trainer. In addition to the Salandit I also provide you with this pokédex to collect data and a few pokéballs so you are able to catch wild pokémon. That should be everything you need to start your journey."

Quickly standing back up, you accept her items and look unconvinced at the door. Sally was obviously still waiting for you outside and the only reasonable way past her would be to beat her in an actual pokémon battle.

Salandit's dual-typing was both a blessing and a curse in the matchup against Sally's Jynx. Both Pokémon focused on special attacks and while fire moves are dealing super effective damage towards Jynx, her psychic attacks are doing the same to your Salandit. Most likely this fight would come down to which side could hit his opponent first and with enough strenght to cause a knockout.

Seems like your first trainer battle was not going to be an easy one.

1153313124442.content:
After giving the rest of the Pokemon available another once-over, you finally decide on the happy Dragonite as your 'starter' Pokemon. It was a pretty easy decision, to be honest; that Muk was giving you a look you really didn't like, and the rest of them had potential, but weren't nearly as powerful as the last two offered to you. You look to her again, and catch her clasping her claws together and giving you a hopeful look. Smiling, you turn to the professor and tell her your answer.

"Alright, Juniper! I choose Dragonite as my Pokemon!"

The second those words left your lips, your new partner zipped across the room, instantly putting you in a rib-crushing hug. You could barely even breath as your face was slammed into her soft, scaled chest. It didn't take long for her to stick her tongue into your hair and lick affectionately. An embarrassed blush spread across your face. Obviously, you had underestimated just how touchy-feely she was.

"H-hey, down girl! I don't want to brush my hair again today!"

Professor Juniper chuckled and put a hand to her cheek, staring at the adorable sight in front of her. "Oh, it's always nice to see a trainer and their partner first meet. This is so cute, it's unbearable! Make room for me, cuties!"

She jumped to your side, squeezing both you and your Dragonite tightly. The surprise thankfully made your Pokemon ease off slightly, but that lucky break was soured by the fact that she started smooching your face as well. The dragon-type didn't seem jealous at all; in fact, you could tell she was even more excited, by how strongly she was nuzzling into the both of you. You sigh in slight annoyance as this continued on for several minutes.

Eventually, you managed to break off of the extended hug by tickling your partner's sides, which made her instinctively jolt her arms towards her stomach (which had the added effect of launching Professor Juniper across the room). Her joyous giggling melted your cold, jaded, lipstick-covered heart, if only slightly. It had been a while since you didn't immediately react to this kind of physical affection with disgust. Maybe this adventure wouldn't be as harrowing as you thought...

You stop tickling her after a bit, instead choosing to rub her belly. She had a positively adorable smile on her face.

"You know what? I think I'm gonna call you Daisy, girl."

'Daisy' squeaked happily, pleased by her new name.

The professor tapped your shoulder, but not before planting yet another kiss on your already-wet cheek. You groan and glance up at her from the linoleum floor.

"Well, I hate to see you go, Kai, but Sally's right outside the door, and she's just itching for a battle! Here's Daisy's pokeball, you're gonna need it to heal her at PokeCenters."

She hands you a basic, red-and-white pokeball. Somehow, the thought of keeping her in here feels wrong. She's just too full of energy to spend her time stuck in a small, round container.

Nevermind that, you should be thinking about the fight with your hated 'rival' and self-declared love interest. It'll feel real good to have Daisy knock her down a peg and teach her not to stick her lips where they don't belong! You can see it now: a well-placed Dragon Tail to Jynx's face, and the battle would be over like that--

Wait. Dragon. Flying. Damnit! Daisy's extremely weak to ice damage; it doesn't matter how strong she is if she can't get an attack off! Looks like this'll be tricky. You only have one shot at beating her, the key metric being speed. If Sally can land an Ice Beam, you're toast, and completely at her whims for the forseeable future. If you can land pretty much any physical move, she's toast, and you're on a pretty good start to your journey.

As you walk out the doors of Juniper's Lab, partner in tow, you feel sweat beading on your brow. You can only hope Daisy's fast enough to finish this before it gets too hairy.

"Heyyy, Kai~! I see you have a brand-new Pokemon at your side. She looks really powerful, I don't know if my Jynx can win~!"

It's clear that Sally's trying to lure you into a false sense of security. You're not falling for it.

You give her a fake smile, hoping you can trick her into going easy on you. "Alright, let's start the battle! If I win, you and your Jynx leave me alone! If you win, well, I don't really need to tell you what'll happen, right?"

Your rival grins eagerly at you, expecting an easy win. Jynx blows a kiss at you, which you barely dodge in time before it slaps against the doors of the lab. You shiver, not wanting to think about how much more kiss-hungry she's become. If that one lipstick-print can cover a good third of those doors, who knows what kind of force she had behind those lips...

"Okay. Here we go! Daisy, fly over to Jynx and use dragon claw! Try not to get hit by her ice moves!"

You notice that Jynx was already charging up her Ice Beam, nearly ready to fire it at your partner. Daisy's gaining fast, putting a lot of power in her wings, but will she get there in time?

All of a sudden, her opponent drops to the ground and fires off an Ice Beam, aimed directly at your Pokemon's belly!

Does Daisy dodge it in time?
1153313124442.title: Daisy, the Overly-Affectionate Dragonite

As you begin to stir awake from your kiss-induced slumber, you take notice of a few things. First, you seemed to be in some sort of bedroom. The lights were out, and you seemed to be laying in a bed. You couldn't tell where exactly you were, but you knew it wasn't home.

The second thing was that you were tied up. Your arms were bound to your sides by... something. You couldn't move your legs either, and your hands were stuck together at the wrists. That means that wherever you were, the owner wanted you to stay., and considering your curse, you could only assume it was some love-struck lady that wanted you. It wouldn't be the first time.

The third and final thing was a two-parter. You were in your underwear, and you felt someone snuggled up to you. Judging by the skin you felt, you guessed they shared your near-nudity. Using your chin, you nudge the blanket on top of you up so you can see underneath.

Once you lifted it up, you were met by Sally planting a peck on your lips. "Mwah. Good morning sweetheart." You recoil a bit at the kiss as she crawls on top of you. You can barely see that she is also in her underwear as she lays with you. Upon seeing her, everything clicked together.

You were in her room. You were tied up because she kidnapped you. Now the only question is why she kidnapped you, and even then, you had a good idea why. "Sally?! Let me go!" You grunt.

"Not yet Kai. First I need you to accept my love as your girlfriend." This again? Ever since the incident where she cornered and kissed you back in grade school, she's convinced herself that she was your girlfriend. It's gotten so bad that she's convinced your parents of it too. To the point where your they would let her into your room and joke about already planning your wedding.

"Seriously, Sally? Those were just a bunch of kids messing with me years ago. We aren't actually dating." You explain, hoping she would understand.

"That's why I need you to see that my love for you is genuine. We can be mature about this, we're both sixteen. Soon you'll see things my way and we'll be together forever. Now give your girlfriend a kiss, Kai." She puckers her lips and leans in.

What happens next?

"Taro it's our favorite part of the day. The part with K-I-S-S-I-N-G.", they say in unison.

"Please I do-oooommmmmppphhhh", Lemon shut Taro up with a smooch before he could technically call them off. She bear hugged him and held his head tightly in her hands almost squeezing out the air in his lungs.

Hi my dear,
